1463670.name: Visual Novel Maker - RE-D FINAL BATTLE MUSIC PACK
1463670.description:
Prepare to give your boss battles the magic and emotion they need with 10 brand new tracks from the RE-D Final Battle Music Pack. This selection of songs can give creators the right tone and energy to fit their epic boss battles which are foundational for every great game. With the RE-D Final Battle Music Pack, creators will have 10 strong song choices to select from to create the perfectly intense moment they are looking for during battle.

Features:

* 10 royalty-free songs in ogg, mp3, m4a, and wav formats
* Music for boss battles
* For use with RPG Maker or the engine of your choice!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
